ygData.subject: Re: Advice needed for Monk Character
ygData.msgSnippet: Brady, First off, there is a monk only mailing list that you can join buy sending a message to: monk-request@eq-internet8.net with JOIN in the Body. And should
ygData.messageBody:
Brady,

First off, there is a monk only mailing list that you
can join buy sending a message to:

monk-request@... with JOIN in the Body.

And should give you a good place to ask questions
and get answers about monk things. Also if any are
interested there is a complete list of all the lists that Jerry
maintains at:

http://eq.internet8.net/lists.htm

And all the classes, spoilers, and general info about
Everquest.

Now for one of your questions, I too have a level 5 monk
and have read about different areas to hunt in. From what I have
read and heard, Misty Thicket is an excellent place to hunt for
monks 5-10. I am planning on going there soon.

And I have heard because of the quickness of your hands
and feet, you should really use hands more than weapons. I
tried using Rusty Hammers and Worn Great Staffs, but have had
more success at using my hands and feet. You are supposed to
get 3 hits in with hands and feet as opposed to 1 with weapons.
This will come in handy later on when attacking spell casters.
The quicker you hit them the better chance you will have to
interupt their spells and without the spells they are dead meat.
And I know the thing about "Well Weapons do more damage".
This is true but if you take by the damage you inflect each
round you will get more damage with the hands. Ie:

Hands and Feet @ level 5 (3 punches at 6 each) 18 dmg
Hammers @ level 5 (1 hit at 12 dmg) 12 dmg

Just some things I have found out. Hope this helps


At 09:30 PM 5/4/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Brady Maxwell <brady_maxwell@...>
>
>Hello All,
>
>I have a 5th level monk in freeport on fennin ro. I
>decided early on to use dual hammers as weapons this
>seems to work out well my stats are ( Or close to) DW
>38 OF 27 Def 28 HTH 12 Kick 17. So here are my
>questions. One should I give up on the Hammers and
>just use my fists ( They seem to do simular damage I
>just like the Hammers) Or should I keep using the
>hammers or switch to another weapon. Also I have been
>looking for hammers better than rusty but cant find
>any to purchase and dont know where to look. I have
>asked around but to no avail. One more question, where
>near freeport should I be adventuring to find better
>stuff. I have tried the bandits but they kill me quick
>and whoever I am with. The Fire Bugs and Armidillas
>are the only mobs that still give exp. Every once in a
>while I can take out a puma or jackal when I can find
>them. I am a half a bubble away from 6 so my guess is
>that the Fire Bugs and armmildillas wont be providing
>exp much longer. Also has anyone ever looted anything
>from an armidilla? Well any other words of advice
>would be greatly appreciated.
>Thanks
>
>
